description: With Demotivate Me you can access your subconcious's deepest and darkest thoughts easily and painlessly. It will tell you what you already know is true. Are you tired to the endless compliments and meaningless pats on the back you get in daily life? Bring your ego down a few well deserved notches with this cracked mirror for your soul.
name: Demotivate Me
shortDescription: Tired of everyone lying to you? This skill will tell you the truth.
